core.name: Thuban: Circumpolar Star
core.description:
Leader Bonus
Leader Skill: Combo/Charged ATKs from any team member deal 34.0% bonus Total DMG. With at least one non-MECH Valkyrie on the team, team deals 40.0% bonus Fire DMG.

subskills.name: Thuban: Circumpolar Star
subskills.description: Combo/Charged ATKs from any team member deal 34.0% bonus Total DMG. With at least one non-MECH Valkyrie on the team, team deals 40.0% bonus Fire DMG.

core.name: Charged ATK: Coma Berenices: Cluster
core.description:
Charged ATK unleashes Void Vortex.
At 600 Astrum, hold [ATK] to perform: Charged ATK - Astral Flare: Ignite: Induce Astral Harness state and unleash Void Vortex to deal 12 x 20% + 200% ATK of Fire DMG.

In Astral Harness and with Void Vortex present, hold [ATK] to perform:
Charged ATK - Astral Flare: Combust: Deal 4 x 30% ATK of Fire DMG and unleash Void Vortex EX to deal 12 x 30% ATK of Fire DMG.

In Astral Harness and with Void Vortex EX present, hold [ATK] to perform:
Charged ATK - Astral Flare: Erupt: Drive Void Vortex forward to gather enemies in a large area dealing 4 x 20% ATK of Fire DMG and then unleash the final blow dealing 1300% ATK of Fire DMG. Casting the Charged ATK ends Astral Harness and resets Astrum.

subskills.name: β Coma Berenices
subskills.description: Astral Harness grants 40.0% bonus Total DMG, boosts Ignore Interrupt, and reduces Total DMG taken by 40.0%.

core.name: Eridanus: Riverflow
core.description:
Passive bonuses apply automatically.
In normal state recovers 80 Astrum per second (Max: 600).
In Astral Harness state, loses 50 Astrum per second. Reverts to normal state at 0 Astrum or switch-out.
Spina Astera's Charged ATK in Astral Harness state generates Void Vortex that pulls enemies over a small area. All enemies are affected by Starshine Circle simultaneously. Upon exiting Astral Harness state, Void Vortex and Starshine Circle both cease.

subskills.name: Blessing of the Holy Blade
subskills.description: Enemies within Starshine Circle take 20.0% bonus Fire DMG from Spina Astera (independent effect).

subskills.name: α Eridanus
subskills.description: In normal state, the landing attack of Basic ATK SEQ 4 restores 50 Astrum on hit.

subskills.name: β Eridanus
subskills.description: Fire DMG increases by 80.0%. Spina Astera deals 20.0% bonus Fire DMG to ignited enemies.

core.name: Pisces: Alrescha
core.description:
Wield the might of the simulated Holy Blade to deal massive DMG.
Spina Astera restores 600 Astrum and enters Astral Harness. She unleashes a massive Void Vortex using the simulated Holy Blade to deal 1500% + 11 x 20% ATK of Fire DMG during which all skill timers and the stage timer are paused. When Ultimate ends, a Void Vortex EX is created in front of Spina Astera.
 SP cost: 100. CD: 20s.

subskills.name: η Pisces
subskills.description: Entering Astral Harness triggers 2s of global Time Fracture.

subskills.name: γ Pisces
subskills.description: Void Vortex ignites enemies on hit and make them take 30% ATK of Fire DMG every 0.5s for 8.0s. Triggering it again resets the duration.

core.name: Andromeda: Nebula
core.description:
Evade enemy attacks up to twice in a row.
Ultimate Evasion Skill: triggers 3s of global Time Fracture and grants 5 stacks of Blazar if in Astral Harness. Also restores 200 HP if there are ignited enemies within Starshine Circle. CD: 15s.
Tap [ATK] immediately after Ultimate Evasion to connect into Basic ATK SEQ 3.

subskills.name: α Andromedae
subskills.description: Ultimate Evasion Skill boosts Valkyrie's Total DMG by 15.0% for 3s and restores 5.0 SP.

subskills.name: β Andromedae
subskills.description: Entering when Astrum is not full grants Valkyrie 200 Astrum. CD: 10s.

core.name: Canis Major: Sirius
core.description:
Wields a scythe to attack and ignite enemies with the might of stars.
Normal State:
SEQ 1: Deals 80% ATK of Fire DMG and restores 10 Astrum.
SEQ 2: Deals 40% + 100% ATK of Fire DMG and restores 5 + 10 Astrum.
SEQ 3: Deals 40% + 100% ATK of Fire DMG and restores 10 + 15 Astrum.
SEQ 4: Deals 3 x 20% + 100% ATK of Fire DMG and restores 3 x 5 + 20 Astrum.

Astral Harness state:
SEQ 1: 80% and bonus 1 Astral Flare DMG once.
SEQ 2: 40% + 100% and bonus 1 Astral Flare DMG once.
SEQ 3: 40% + 150% and bonus 2 Astral Flare DMG twice.
SEQ 4: 4 x 20% + 100%
SEQ 5: 150% + 300%

Astral Flare deals 30% ATK of Fire DMG each time.

In Astral Harness, Basic ATK grants one stack of Blazar on hit and each stack makes the Astral Flare: Erupt thrust deal 30% ATK of Fire DMG. SEQ 1/2/3/4 of Basic ATK each grants 1 stack, and SEQ 5 grants 5 stacks. 20 stacks max. Casting Ultimate grants full stacks. Casting Astral Flare: Erupt or exiting Astral Harness resets Blazar.

subskills.name: α Canis Major
subskills.description: Astral Flare: Erupt deals 150.0% ATK of bonus Fire DMG.

subskills.name: ε Canis Major
subskills.description: In Astral Harness, Basic ATK SEQ 4 ignites enemies on hit and make them take 30% ATK of Fire DMG every 0.5s for 8.0s. Triggering it again resets the duration.

subskills.name: QTE: δ Canis Major
subskills.description: QTE: Triggered when an enemy is knocked airborne or ignited to induce 3s of global Time Fracture, deal 5 x 250% ATK Fire DMG, and restore 5.0 SP.
